name: Soup Land
description:
A game made in bitsy for the soup jam. It didn't make the deadline, but the game exists regardless.

A surreal exploration game about being a traveling soupmonger as penance for an unknown crime. Talk to everyone and learn about the history of Soup Land.  Explore the world during the day and at night. Fish and gather ingredients to make delicious(?) soups and bring the people of Soup Land together. Or drive them apart?

Warning: This game has some exploration and discussion of dark themes, including war, death, corpses, and genocide.

Controls: Use arrow keys to move. Bump into things to interact with them.

Tools used:

Art, game creation: Bitsy

Music: Guitar Pro 6, FL Studio
